subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The boosters of inequity, the true power brokers of college football, take comfort in their “white-like-me” hires as a perk of owning the program with their six-figure donations.
snippet: The boosters of inequity, the true power brokers of college football, take comfort in their “white-like-me” hires as a perk of owning the program with their six-figure donations.
